com.dpsframework.core.engines

Class ConsoleRouterCLIPS

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dpsframework.core.engines.ConsoleRouterCLIPS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, net.sf.clipsrules.jni.Router
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsolePanelCLIPS

    public class ConsoleRouterCLIPS
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.sf.clipsrules.jni.Router, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    Class for connecting CLIPS Router to Shell-Engine Console.

    Take care about UTF-8 at line #89 commented for i18n integrations. https://github.com/smarr/CLIPS/tree/master/clipsjni/java-src/CLIPSJNI

    Since:
    2015, update at: 2018-08-24
    Version:
    1.7 (Build.1814)
    Author:
    Francisco J. Aguayo (Leon University / IEEE Power & Energy Systems Society Member)
